name: Viking Versus Aliens: Abduction DEMO
description:
Wake up to a village that is completely empty. You call for your Brother and Friend but with no reply.

There is a still strange sound that permeates the silence. 

In this VR game, you play as a Viking who is abducted by Aliens. You will need  to survive long enough to be abducted.

First installment of a Trilogy I have in mind.
